author: Lai Siu Chiu J:
casename: Chin Tyng Lei v Lim Yoon Ngok
counsel: Madan Assomull and Vivian Chew (Assomull & Partners) for the plaintiff; Leo Cheng Suan (Infinitus Law Corporation) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Summary judgment/Leave to defend claim/Plaintiff claiming from defendant money loaned/Defendant alleging that loans from plaintiff were not made to him personally but were extended to company of which they were both directors/Defendant also claiming that sum owed to plaintiff smaller than that claimed/Whether defendant's contentions supported by evidence/Whether defendant should be granted leave to defend claim
Civil Procedure/Summary judgment/Conditional leave to defend/Factors to be considered when ordering security to be provided as condition of being granted leave to defend claim
